text: I have started tomcat with tcp cluster enabled, but I cannot see the cluster MBean. The MBean seems not to be registered.
creator: stephane.zeng@yahoo.fr
markt@apache.org
text: This works for me. Please follow up on the users mailing list if you still experience this issue.

creator: markt@apache.org
text: Re-open this. Looks like I was testing with trunk. 6.0.x doesn't have any MBeans at the moment. Make this an enhancement request to add some.
When MBeans are added, the commented out 'Management' section in the cluster-howto will need to be updated and re-enabled.
creator: markt@apache.org

text: No patch submitted and no committer activity on this in over 2 years. This feature is available in 7.0.x (with some recent enhancements to be available in 7.0.31). On that basis I am closing this as won't fix.
creator: markt@apache.org
